cause.description:
The Grady Paul Larson Foundation will lead a non-denominational effort to demonstrate faith in action and community service, to those who do not have a personal relationship with Jesus Christ, by sponsoring sporting events that benefit the Make-A- Wish Foundation ® of Iowa or other charitable human service organizations.
We hold softball tournaments to sponsor children.
1. Jesus is Lord.
2. Do it for the kids
cause.mission: Leading others to Christ through sports ministry.
cause.name: Grady Paul Larson Foundation
